thread.title: How the reval affected Conway selectmen | Local News | conwaydailysun.com
thread.title_full: How the reval affected Conway selectmen | Local News | conwaydailysun.com

author: Daymond Steer
title: How the reval affected Conway selectmen | Local News | conwaydailysun.com
text: CONWAY — This year's revaluation has been the talk of the town as many residential taxpayers have seen their values and bills skyrocket. So, the Sun decided to look at the property values and taxes of each of the five members of the town's board of selectmen. The reval, conducted by contracted assessor Marybeth Walker of Corcoran Consulting Associates of Wolfeboro, was done a year early because assessed values, for tax purposes, were out of whack. kAm(2= 6?VD >66E:?8 %F6D52J Wy2?] aX E@ 8:G6 2 AC6D6?E2E:@?
